summary: THE ANTI-LOCK BRAKE SYSTEM WARNING LIGHT ILLUMINATED AND WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER FOR SERVICE.  DEALER DIAGNOSED THE ABS HYDRAULIC CONTROL UNIT HAD FAILED AND NEEDED TO BE REPLACED.  *JB  THE CONTROL UNIT WAS COVERED BY THE MANUFACTURER IN 1998.  FAILURE OF THIS PART COULD ALLOW THE BRAKES TO LOCK UP CAUSING THE VEHICLE TO SLIDE OUT OF CONTROL.  *SCC
